genresAdvancedInfo.name: hindustani vocal
genresAdvancedInfo.description: Hindustani vocal music is a genre of music that focuses on the use of the human voice to create beautiful melodies and rhythms. The music is often accompanied by traditional Indian instruments such as the tabla and harmonium. The genre has a long history and is deeply rooted in Indian culture. It is often associated with spiritual and religious practices and is considered to be a form of meditation.

index.head-title: Spotify Top artists and songs - Stats about your music on Spotify

index.what-is-spotify-top-content: The {strongOpen}easiest{strongClose} way to get stats about your listening history on Spotify. Find out and share your {strongOpen}top artists{strongClose}, {strongOpen}tracks{strongClose}, and {strongOpen}genres{strongClose}.
